summary: Three friends set out to disprove cannibalism on a trip to the Amazonian jungle, where they meet two men trying to escape a vicious cannibal tribe.
cast: Giovanni Lombardo Radice|Lorraine De Selle|Danilo Mattei|Zora Kerova|Walter Lucchini|Fiamma Maglione|Robert Kerman|John Bartha|Venantino Venantini|Miguel Ángel Rincón|Giovanni Bergamini|Riccardo Petrazzi|Perry Pirkanen|Dominic Raacke|Jake Teague
title: Caníbal feroz
